jtbds.statement: When I am using Dropbox, I want to access all features using keyboard navigation, so I can use the service effectively without needing a mouse.
jtbds.situation: I am using Dropbox
jtbds.motivation: access all features using keyboard navigation
jtbds.outcome: use the service effectively without needing a mouse
sourceQuotes: I want all website features, including file actions (rename, move, share) and menus, to be fully accessible using Tab and Enter keys, so I can use Dropbox effectively without a mouse.

jtbds.statement: When using Dropbox Transfer to send files to clients, I want the option to customize the download page with my company logo and branding, so I can look more professional and reinforce our brand identity
jtbds.situation: using Dropbox Transfer to send files to clients
jtbds.motivation: customize the download page with my company logo and branding
jtbds.outcome: look more professional and reinforce our brand identity
sourceQuotes: When using Dropbox Transfer to send files to clients, I want the option to customize the download page with my company logo and branding, so it looks more professional and reinforces our brand identity.

jtbds.statement: When I send a file request link to a client who doesn't have a Dropbox account, I want them to be able to upload files without being prompted multiple times to sign up or log in, so the process is smooth and doesn't deter them from sending the files.
jtbds.situation: I send a file request link to a client who doesn't have a Dropbox account
jtbds.motivation: I want them to be able to upload files without being prompted multiple times to sign up or log in
jtbds.outcome: the process is smooth and doesn't deter them from sending the files
sourceQuotes: When I send a file request link to a client who doesn't have a Dropbox account, I want them to be able to upload files *without* being prompted multiple times to sign up or log in, so the process is smooth and doesn't deter them from sending the files.

jtbds.statement: When setting up security features like 2FA, I want extremely clear instructions and multiple backup options, so I can feel confident I won't get locked out of my account
jtbds.situation: setting up security features like 2FA
jtbds.motivation: want extremely clear instructions and multiple backup options
jtbds.outcome: feel confident I won't get locked out of my account
sourceQuotes: Found setting up 2FA slightly confusing, wanted more recovery options.
I want extremely clear instructions and multiple backup options (like recovery codes AND a backup phone number), so I feel confident I won't get locked out of my account.

jtbds.statement: When syncing a large number of small files, I want the desktop client to be more efficient and use fewer system resources, so I can prevent my computer from slowing down significantly during the sync process.
jtbds.situation: syncing a large number of small files
jtbds.motivation: the desktop client to be more efficient and use fewer system resources
jtbds.outcome: prevent my computer from slowing down significantly during the sync process
sourceQuotes: I want the desktop client to be more efficient and use fewer system resources, so my computer doesn't slow down significantly during the sync process.

jtbds.statement: When integrating with the Dropbox API, I want clearer documentation and more predictable behavior regarding rate limits, so I can build more robust integrations that handle limits gracefully.
jtbds.situation: integrating with the Dropbox API
jtbds.motivation: clearer documentation and more predictable behavior regarding rate limits
jtbds.outcome: build more robust integrations that handle limits gracefully
sourceQuotes: When integrating with the Dropbox API, I want clearer documentation and more predictable behavior regarding rate limits, perhaps with specific headers returned indicating current status, so I can build more robust integrations that handle limits gracefully.

jtbds.statement: When I receive lecture slides as PDFs in Dropbox, I want to annotate them directly within Dropbox, so I can study and mark up documents without downloading them and using another app.
jtbds.situation: I receive lecture slides as PDFs in Dropbox
jtbds.motivation: I want to annotate them directly within Dropbox
jtbds.outcome: I can study and mark up documents without downloading them and using another app
sourceQuotes: As a student who receives lecture slides as PDFs in Dropbox, I want built-in annotation tools (highlighting, notes) directly within the Dropbox preview, so that I can study and mark up documents without downloading them and using another app.

jtbds.statement: When collaborating on sensitive documents, I want to have more granular permissions, so I can have finer control over how my shared files are used
jtbds.situation: collaborating on sensitive documents
jtbds.motivation: have more granular permissions
jtbds.outcome: have finer control over how my shared files are used
sourceQuotes: As someone collaborating on sensitive documents, I want more granular permissions, like 'comment-only' access or preventing downloads for view-only users, so that I have finer control over how my shared files are used.

jtbds.statement: When planning content calendars, I want to use specific templates and features for status tracking and task management, so I can manage our entire content workflow efficiently within Dropbox.
jtbds.situation: planning content calendars
jtbds.motivation: use specific templates and features for status tracking and task management
jtbds.outcome: manage our entire content workflow efficiently within Dropbox
sourceQuotes: As a content marketing team using Paper, we want specific templates and features for planning content calendars (like status tracking, due dates, assignee fields integrated with file links), so we can manage our entire content workflow within Dropbox.

jtbds.statement: When using Dropbox for both work and personal purposes, I want to separate camera upload destinations or have better filtering before upload, so I can prevent my vacation photos from cluttering my work folders.
jtbds.situation: using Dropbox for both work and personal purposes
jtbds.motivation: separate camera upload destinations or have better filtering before upload
jtbds.outcome: prevent my vacation photos from cluttering my work folders
sourceQuotes: As someone using Dropbox for both work and personal life, I want separate camera upload destinations or better filtering *before* upload, so that my vacation photos don't clutter my work folders.

jtbds.statement: When I am traveling without internet access, I want to easily manage my offline files, so I can quickly find what I need.
jtbds.situation: I am traveling without internet access
jtbds.motivation: easily manage my offline files
jtbds.outcome: quickly find what I need
sourceQuotes: Making files available offline on the mobile app is great, but managing them is tricky.

jtbds.statement: When the 'Shared with Me' section gets cluttered, I want to organize items shared with me using my own folders or tags, so I can manage and find these items more effectively
jtbds.situation: the 'Shared with Me' section gets cluttered
jtbds.motivation: organize items shared with me using my own folders or tags
jtbds.outcome: manage and find these items more effectively
sourceQuotes: The 'Shared with Me' section gets cluttered quickly.
I want the ability to organize items shared with me (e.g., using my own folders or tags, without affecting the owner), so I can manage and find these items more effectively.

jtbds.statement: When creating recurring documents like meeting notes or project plans in Paper, I want to use customizable templates, so I can start new documents quickly with a pre-defined structure
jtbds.situation: creating recurring documents like meeting notes or project plans in Paper
jtbds.motivation: use customizable templates
jtbds.outcome: start new documents quickly with a pre-defined structure
sourceQuotes: Dropbox Paper is useful, but starting from scratch is slow
I want to use customizable templates, so I can start new documents quickly with a pre-defined structure

jtbds.statement: When managing my password entries, I want to add notes or custom fields, so I can store all related login information securely in one place
jtbds.situation: managing my password entries
jtbds.motivation: add notes or custom fields
jtbds.outcome: store all related login information securely in one place
sourceQuotes: I want the ability to add notes or custom fields to password entries (e.g., for security questions or setup codes), so I can store all related login information securely in one place.

jtbds.statement: When a file or folder is deleted, especially from a shared space, I want clearer warnings about the impact on collaborators and perhaps a longer recovery window or admin controls for restoration, so accidental deletions are less disruptive.
jtbds.situation: a file or folder is deleted, especially from a shared space
jtbds.motivation: clearer warnings about the impact on collaborators and perhaps a longer recovery window or admin controls for restoration
jtbds.outcome: accidental deletions are less disruptive
sourceQuotes: When a file or folder is deleted, especially from a shared space, I want clearer warnings about the impact on collaborators and perhaps a longer recovery window or admin controls for restoration, so accidental deletions are less disruptive.

jtbds.statement: When managing my storage, I want a visual breakdown showing storage usage by folder or file type, so I can easily identify large items and clean up my account
jtbds.situation: managing my storage
jtbds.motivation: a visual breakdown showing storage usage by folder or file type
jtbds.outcome: easily identify large items and clean up my account
sourceQuotes: When managing my storage, I want a visual breakdown (like a pie chart or treemap) showing storage usage by folder or file type, so I can easily identify large items and clean up my account.

jtbds.statement: When managing projects, I want to link Dropbox files directly within tasks, so I can ensure team members have access to necessary documents.
jtbds.situation: managing projects
jtbds.motivation: link Dropbox files directly within tasks
jtbds.outcome: ensure team members have access to necessary documents
sourceQuotes: It would be amazing if Dropbox files could be linked directly within Asana/Trello tasks.

jtbds.statement: When I need to share very large files (over 5GB) that exceed email limits, I want a simple, reliable way to send a download link through Dropbox, so my collaborators can access the files without needing special software or accounts.
jtbds.situation: I need to share very large files (over 5GB) that exceed email limits
jtbds.motivation: I want a simple, reliable way to send a download link through Dropbox
jtbds.outcome: My collaborators can access the files without needing special software or accounts
sourceQuotes: When I need to share very large files (over 5GB) that exceed email limits, I want a simple, reliable way to send a download link through Dropbox, so my collaborators can access the files without needing special software or accounts.

jtbds.statement: When navigating complex shared folders, I want enhanced search capabilities, so I can locate necessary documents quickly
jtbds.situation: navigating complex shared folders
jtbds.motivation: enhanced search capabilities
jtbds.outcome: locate necessary documents quickly
sourceQuotes: When navigating complex shared folders, I want enhanced search capabilities, like searching within specific subfolders or filtering by file type/date modified, so I can locate necessary documents quickly.

jtbds.statement: When I need to revert to an older version of a document, I want a side-by-side comparison view or highlighted changes between versions, so I can easily see what was modified and choose the correct version to restore.
jtbds.situation: I need to revert to an older version of a document
jtbds.motivation: I want a side-by-side comparison view or highlighted changes between versions
jtbds.outcome: I can easily see what was modified and choose the correct version to restore
sourceQuotes: When I need to revert to an older version of a document, I want a side-by-side comparison view or highlighted changes between versions, so I can easily see what was modified and choose the correct version to restore.

scenarios.statement: As a user who relies on keyboard navigation, I want to use all website features with the Tab and Enter keys, so that I can navigate Dropbox without a mouse.
scenarios.persona: user who relies on keyboard navigation
scenarios.action: use all website features with the Tab and Enter keys
scenarios.value: navigate Dropbox without a mouse

scenarios.statement: As a business owner, I want to customize the Dropbox Transfer download page with my company's branding, so that I can enhance professionalism and strengthen brand recognition
scenarios.action: customize the Dropbox Transfer download page with my company's branding
scenarios.value: enhance professionalism and strengthen brand recognition

scenarios.statement: As a business professional, I want to ensure clients can upload files easily without needing a Dropbox account, so that I can facilitate efficient file exchanges.
scenarios.action: ensure clients can upload files easily without needing a Dropbox account
scenarios.value: facilitate efficient file exchanges

scenarios.statement: As a security-conscious user, I want to understand and set up 2FA with confidence, so that I can ensure my account's safety without fear of being locked out
scenarios.action: understand and set up 2FA with confidence
scenarios.value: ensure my account's safety without fear of being locked out

scenarios.statement: As a software developer, I want to sync my code repositories efficiently, so that I can work without interruptions or slowdowns.
scenarios.action: sync my code repositories efficiently
scenarios.value: work without interruptions or slowdowns

scenarios.statement: As a developer, I want to have clear rate limit information and documentation, so that I can ensure my application handles API limits without disruption.
scenarios.action: have clear rate limit information and documentation
scenarios.value: ensure my application handles API limits without disruption

scenarios.statement: As a student, I want to use built-in annotation tools directly within Dropbox, so that I can study and mark up documents without downloading them and using another app.
scenarios.action: use built-in annotation tools directly within Dropbox
scenarios.value: study and mark up documents without downloading them and using another app

scenarios.statement: As a collaborator on sensitive documents, I want to set granular sharing permissions, so that I can control user access levels and actions
scenarios.action: set granular sharing permissions
scenarios.value: control user access levels and actions

scenarios.statement: As a content marketing team, I want to have specific templates and features for planning and tracking content, so that I can streamline our content management process within Dropbox Paper.
scenarios.action: have specific templates and features for planning and tracking content
scenarios.value: streamline our content management process within Dropbox Paper

scenarios.statement: As a Dropbox user managing both personal and work content, I want to organize my photos before they are uploaded, so that I can keep my work and personal images separate.
scenarios.persona: Dropbox user managing both personal and work content
scenarios.action: organize my photos before they are uploaded
scenarios.value: keep my work and personal images separate

scenarios.statement: As a frequent traveler, I want a dedicated section in the app to view and manage only my offline files, so that I can quickly find what I need without internet access.
scenarios.action: access a dedicated section in the app to view and manage only my offline files
scenarios.value: quickly find what I need without internet access

scenarios.statement: As a user who receives many shared files and folders, I want to organize shared items without affecting the owner, so that I can efficiently manage and access them
scenarios.persona: user who receives many shared files and folders
scenarios.action: organize shared items without affecting the owner
scenarios.value: efficiently manage and access them

scenarios.statement: As a user who frequently creates documents, I want to access and use templates, so that I can save time and maintain consistency across documents
scenarios.action: access and use templates
scenarios.value: save time and maintain consistency across documents

scenarios.statement: As a security-conscious user, I want to add notes to my password entries, so that I can keep all information needed for logins in one secure location
scenarios.action: add notes to my password entries
scenarios.value: keep all information needed for logins in one secure location

scenarios.statement: As a collaborator, I want to receive clear notifications and have access to recovery options when a shared file is deleted, so that I can ensure continuity and prevent disruptions in our work.
scenarios.action: receive clear notifications and have access to recovery options when a shared file is deleted
scenarios.value: ensure continuity and prevent disruptions in our work

scenarios.statement: As a Dropbox user, I want to see a visual breakdown of my storage usage, so that I can manage my account more effectively
scenarios.action: see a visual breakdown of my storage usage
scenarios.value: manage my account more effectively

scenarios.statement: As a project manager, I want to attach specific Dropbox files or folders directly to tasks in my project management tool, so that I can ensure team members have immediate access to the relevant documents for their work.
scenarios.action: attach specific Dropbox files or folders directly to tasks in my project management tool
scenarios.value: ensure team members have immediate access to the relevant documents for their work

scenarios.statement: As a collaborator, I want to receive large files easily via a download link, so that I can access them without needing special software or creating new accounts.
scenarios.action: receive large files easily via a download link
scenarios.value: access them without needing special software or creating new accounts

scenarios.statement: As a team member, I want to easily find specific files within shared folders, so that I can save time and improve my productivity
scenarios.action: easily find specific files within shared folders
scenarios.value: save time and improve my productivity

scenarios.statement: As a meticulous document editor, I want to compare different versions of a file visually, so that I can accurately restore the necessary version.
scenarios.action: compare different versions of a file visually
